description: Comprehensive monitoring for Whisper Transcription Pipeline

targets.expr: ((sum(flower_events_total{type="task-received"}) or vector(0)) - (sum(flower_events_total{type="task-succeeded"}) or vector(0)) - (sum(flower_events_total{type="task-failed"}) or vector(0)) + abs((sum(flower_events_total{type="task-received"}) or vector(0)) - (sum(flower_events_total{type="task-succeeded"}) or vector(0)) - (sum(flower_events_total{type="task-failed"}) or vector(0)))) / 2

panels.title: Task Completion vs DB Recordings Correlation

targets.expr: sum(max_over_time({container=~"whisper-worker.*"} |= "Transcription progress" | regexp "Transcription progress: (?P<segments>\\d+) segment" | unwrap segments | __error__="" [$__interval]))

panels.title: Task Activity vs Segment Processing Progression

title: Whisper Pipeline Overview
